A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please\, please\, please don't make another Star Wars movie... PLEASE! This thing needs to end! An improbable demise for a major character\, baby Vader is still dumb and unconvincing when he tries to be intimidating. The young actors are still one of the worse acting ensembles ever and the storyline a bore. All good things must come to an end... Bad things like this should end even sooner.
